snippet: BAMBERGER--Niels, passed away on March 7, 2016. Beloved husband of 60 years to Tove, cherished father of Annette (Steve) and Debbie (Hershey), adored grandfather, great-grandfather, brother and friend. His loss leaves a void in our lives that will never be filled. Niels faced every struggle with strength and grace and he will be missed by all who knew him. Zichrono L'Bracha 1/3
lead_paragraph: BAMBERGER--Niels, passed away on March 7, 2016. Beloved husband of 60 years to Tove, cherished father of Annette (Steve) and Debbie (Hershey), adored grandfather, great-grandfather, brother and friend. His loss leaves a void in our lives that will never be filled. Niels faced every struggle with strength and grace and he will be missed by all who knew him. Zichrono L'Bracha 1/3
